main event: A witness observed a small, metallic, circular object in the sky over Rochester, Michigan on April 21, 1967.
interesting points: The object appeared to be the size of a pencil eraser held at arm's length.
The object was a light silver or chrome color and had a circular, coin-like shape.
The object ascended vertically out of sight.
The witness and several other people in the neighborhood also saw the object.
The object moved slowly and purposefully, as if it was under control.
